items.title: coding
items.description: As a developer with a well-rounded skill set, I can do both frontend and backend development. But as I worked on both I discovered my true passion lies in backend development.

items.title: creativity
items.description: While I don't concider myself extremely creative, I find joy in tackling challenging problems and resolving them with effective solutions.
